caption.center: PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF MICHIGAN, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. LEWIS LESLIE

opinion.opinion_text:
COA: 232413, Genesee CC: 99-004966-FC
On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal from the March 29, 2001 decision of the Court of Appeals is considered, and we DIRECT the Genesee County Prosecuting Attorney to file an answer, within 28 days after the date of this order, focusing on Issues I, IV and V in the defendant's application.
The application remains under consideration.
